description:
Are you an experienced Administrative Assistant with a desire to excel? If so, then Talent Software Services may have the job for you! Our client is seeking an experienced Administrative Assistant to work in Valencia, CA.

Position Summary:  The primary focus is providing moderately complex administrative support for individuals and/or departments. Works under general supervision and receives detailed instructions only for new assignments.

Primary Responsibilities/Accountabilities:

* Register meetings through Cvent and create websites
* Reconcile budget with Global meetings management
* Internal show budget reconciliation
* Payments to vendors
* Meeting card reconciliation
* Maintain conference calendar
* Maintain teams' folders
* Submit commercial sponsorship requests and track payments
* Maintenance of tracking conference spreadsheet
* General administrative duties
* Build Quality into all aspects of their work by maintaining compliance to all quality requirements.

Qualifications:

* High School degree required.
* Must have strong Excel and Microsoft skills
* Strong multi-tasking skills
* Position requires some manual labor - packing and unpacking collateral materials shipped to and from trade shows

Preferred:

* Prefer previous trade show or event experience
* Cvent experience a plus!
